Paragraph.Text: SPECIAL FARE WITHIN KAZAKHSTAN APPLICATION AREA THESE FARES APPLY WITHIN KAZAKHSTAN. CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES. FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/CIRCLE-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS. FREE ALLOWANCE - 20KG FOR ECONOMY CLASS --- CAPACITY LIMITATIONS THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS C ARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAIL ABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE A VAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY T HE CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT. OTHER CONDITIONS FULL AND SEQUENTIAL USE OF COUPONS- THIS FARE IS ONLY VALID WHEN FLIGHT COUPONS ARE US ED IN THE SAME ORDER AS SHOWN ON THE TICKET.
TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN 1 MONTH AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.

FROM/TO KAZAKHSTAN
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON KC AND MAY ONLY BE SOLD IN KAZAKHSTAN

FROM/TO KAZAKHSTAN FOR SOWKZ TYPE FARES
RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS. WAITLIST AND STANDBY NOT PERMITTED.

PENALTIES (PE) FOR ECONOMY OW EXCURSION - 5TH LEVEL FARES
CANCELLATIONS
BEFORE DEPARTURE CHARGE KZT 3500. WAIVED FOR ILLNESS OF PASSENGER OR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. NOTE - THIS RULE APPLIES THE PENALTY SUM FOR EACH MODIFIED FARE COMPONENT. A.REFUND THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE FARE PAID AND APPLICABLE ONE WAY FARE IN THE SAME RBD OR HIGHER RBD. B.WAIVED IN CASE OF CERTIFIED DEATH OF PASSENGER OR AN IMMEDIATE FAMILY MEMBER OR ILLNESS WITH LEGAL CONFIRMATION FROM MEDICAL INSTITUTION. C.USE HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT AT ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUANCE DATE. D.CHILD DISCOUNTS APPLY. INFANTS FREE OF CHARGE. E.IF THERE IS NO APPLICABLE FOR THE SECTORS USED USE THE HIGHER BOOKING CODE ON SUCH SECTORS. F.REFUND APPLICATIONS MUST BE SUBMITTED WITHIN 60 DAYS FROM TRAVEL COMMENCEMENT. G.FURTHER FARE RESTRICTIONS APPLY. CONTACT CARRIER FOR DETAILS. H.REFUND CAN ONLY BE MADE THROUGH ISSUING OFFICE. IF REFUND PERMITTED FLIGHTS SEGMENTS MUST BE CANCELLED NO LATER THAN CHECK-IN START TIME/ 24 HOURS PRIOR TO DEPARTURE IN SUCH CASE A REFUND MAY BE REQUESTED DURING TICKET VALIDITY PERIOD.OTHERWISE NO-SHOW PROVISIONS WILL APPLY. PENALTY CONDITIONS HAVE TO APPLY THE PENALTY SUM FOR EACH MODIFIED FARE COMPONENT. ------------------------------------------------- YR TAX IS NON-REFUNDABLE AT ANY TIME. TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NO-SHOW. NOTE - NO-SHOW - BOOKINGS NOT CANCELLED 24 HOURS PRIOR TO FLIGHT DEPARTURE OR IF PASSENGER FAILS TO CHECK-IN ON TIME CHANGES. THIS RULE APPLIES THE PENALTY SUM FOR EACH MODIFIED FARE COMPONENT. I. NO-SHOW FEE APPLIES IF THE PASSENGER IS NO SHOW ON ANY FLIGHT SEGMENT IN ADDITION TO THE PENAL- TY CHARGE. NO-SHOW DEFINITION - A PASSENGER FAILS TO CHANGE HIS OR HER RESERVATIONS BEFORE DEPARTURE OF THE FLIGHT. II.TICKET/YQ/YR AND ALL AIRPORT TAXES ARE NON- REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NO-SHOW.
CHANGES
BEFORE DEPARTURE CHARGE KZT 3500 FOR REISSUE. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. NOTE - BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY - REPRICE USING CUR- RENT FARES IN EFFECT AT THE DATE OF TICKET REIS- SUANCE. CHANGE FEE IS NON-REFUNDABLE AT ANY TIME. IN THE EVENT THE FARE OR TAXES HAVE INCREASED THE TICKET MUST BE REISSUED AND ADDITIONAL FARES OR FARES COLLECTED. PENALTY WAIVED FOR CERTIFIED DEATH OF PASSENGER OR AN IMMEDIATE FAMILY MEMBER. THE PENALTY SUM HAS TO BE APPLIED FOR EACH FARE C COMPONENT. IF NEW BASE FARE IS LOWER THAN THE PREVIOUS BASE FARE IGNORE ANY RESIDUAL AMOUNT AND NO REFUND PERMITTED. CHARGE CHANGE FEE IF ANY. CHANGE FEE IS SUBJECT TO EACH CHANGE TRANSACTION. CHANGES MUST BE WITHIN THE TICKET VALIDITY. FURTHER FARE RESTRICTIONS APPLY. CONTACT CARRIER FOR DETAILS. NEW FARE AMOUNT SHOULD BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN THE PREVIOUS AMOUNT. ANY DIFFERENCE IN FARES PLUS CHANGE FEE MUST BE COLLECTED. ALL RULE PROVISIONS OF THE NEW FARE INCLUDING ADVANCE PURCHASE/MIN. STAY/MAX.STAY/SEASONALITY/ETC. MUST BE MET. THE ENTIRE TICKET MUST BE REPRICED USING HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT OH THE DATE OF THE ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE. DOWNGRADING TO THE LOWER RBD IS NOT PERMITTED FOR ANY CHANGED FARE COMPONENT. REROUTING - NOT PERMITTED AT ANY TIME. REVALIDATION - NOT PERMITTTED AT ANY TIME. CHANGES ARE NOT PERMITTED AFTER THE DEPARTURE TIME SHOWN ON THE APPLICABLE FLIGHT COUPON/INCL NO-SHOW/. IN THIS CASE TICKET HAS NO VALUE. EXCEPTION - FARE RULES WHICH ALLOW TO MAKE CHANGES IN CASE OF NO-SHOW. PENALTY CONDITIONS HAVE TO APPLY THE PENALTY SUM FOR EACH MODIFIED FARE COMPONENT. CHANGES NOT PERMITTED IN CASE OF NO-SHOW. NOTE - NO-SHOW - BOOKINGS NOT CANCELLED 24 HOURS PRIOR TO FLIGHT DEPARTURE OR IF PASSENGER FAILS TO CHECK-IN ON TIME CHANGES. THIS RULE APPLIES THE PENALTY SUM FOR EACH MODIFIED FARE COMPONENT. I. NO SHOW FEE APPLIES IF THE PASSENGER IS NO SHOW ON ANY FLIGHT SEGMENT IN ADDITION TO THE PENAL- TY CHARGE. NO-SHOW DEFINITION - A PASSENGER FAILS TO CHANGE HIS OR HER RESERVATIONS BEFORE DEPARTURE OF THE FLIGHT.

G.FURTHER RESTRICTIONS APPLY. CONTACT CARRIER FOR DETAILS. H.REFUND CAN ONLY BE MADE THROUGH ISSUING OFFICE IF REFUND PERMITTED FLIGHTS SEGMENTS MUST BE CANCELLED NO LATER THAN CHECK-IN START TIME/ 24 HOURS PRIOR TO DEPARTURE IN SUCH CASE A REFUND MAY BE REQUESTED DURING TICKET VALIDITY PERIOD.OTHERWISE NO-SHOW PROVISIONS APPLY. PENALTY CONDITIONS HAVE TO APPLY THE PENALTY SUM F FOR EACH MODIFIED FARE COMPONENT. ------------------------------------------------- YR TAX IS NON-REFUNDABLE AT ANY TIME. TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NO-SHOW. NOTE - NO-SHOW - BOOKINGS NOT CANCELLED 24 HOURS PRIOR TO FLIGHT DEPARTURE OR IF PASSENGER FAILS TO CHECK-IN ON TIME CHANGES. THIS RULE APPLIES THE PENALTY SUM FOR EACH MODIFIED FARE COMPONENT. I. NO SHOW FEE APPLIES IF THE PASSENGER IS NO SHOW ON ANY FLIGHT SEGMENT IN ADDITION TO THE PENAL- TY CHARGE. NO-SHOW DEFINITION - A PASSENGER FAILS TO CHANGE HIS OR HER RESERVATIONS BEFORE DEPARTURE OF THE FLIGHT. II.TICKET/YQ/YR AND ALL AIRPORT TAXES ARE NON- REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NO-SHOW.
CHANGES
AFTER DEPARTURE CHARGE KZT 4500 FOR REISSUE. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. NOTE - ANYTIME PERMITTED FOR REISSUE AND NO-SHOW. AFTER DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY - REPRICE USING HISTO- RICAL FARES IN EFFECT AT ORIGINAL TICKET DATE. CHANGE FEE IS NON-REFUNDABLE AT ANY TIME. IN THE EVENT THE FARE OR TAXES HAVE INCREASED THE TICKET MUST BE REISSUED AND ADDITIONAL FARES OR FARES COLLECTED. PENALTY WAIVED FOR CERTIFIED DEATH OF PASSENGER OR AN IMMEDIATE FAMILY MEMBER. IN CASE OF FARE COMBINATION APPLY THE PENALTY SUM FOR EACH CANCELLED/REFUNDED FARE COMPONENT. IF NEW BASE FARE IS LOWER THAN THE PREVIOUS BASE FARE IGNORE ANY RESIDUAL AMOUNT AND NO REFUND PERMITTED. CHARGE CHANGE FEE IF ANY. CHANGE FEE IS SUBJECT TO EACH CHANGE TRANSACTION. CHANGES MUST BE WITHIN THE TICKET VALIDITY. FURTHER FARE RESTRICTIONS APPLY. CONTACT CARRIER FOR DETAILS. NEW FARE AMOUNT SHOULD BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN THE PREVIOUS AMOUNT. ANY DIFFERENCE IN FARES PLUS CHANGE FEE MUST BE COLLECTED. ALL RULE PROVISIONS OF THE NEW FARE INCLUDING ADVANCE PURCHASE/MIN. STAY/MAX.STAY/SEASONALITY/ETC. MUST BE MET. ITINERARY SHOULD BE RE-PRICED USING FARES IN EFFECT AT THE TIME OF THE ORIGINAL TICKETING FOR FULLY FLOWN FARE COMPONENTS / CURRENCT FARES FOR PARTIALLY AND WHOLLY UNFLOWN UNTRAVELED FARE COMPONENTS. DOWNGRADING TO THE LOWER RBD IS NOT PERMITTED FOR ANY CHANGED FARE COMPONENT. REROUTING - NOT PERMITTED AT ANY TIME REVALIDATION - NOT PERMITTTED AT ANY TIME. CHANGES ARE NOT PERMITTED AFTER THE DEPARTURE TIME SHOWN ON THE APPLICABLE FLIGHT COUPON/INCL NO-SHOW/. IN THIS CASE TICKET HAS NO VALUE. EXCEPTION - FARE RULES WHICH ALLOW TO MAKE CHANGES IN CASE OF NO-SHOW. PENALTY CONDITIONS HAVE TO APPLY THE PENALTY SUM FOR EACH MODIFIED FARE COMPONENT. CHANGES NOT PERMITTED IN CASE OF NO-SHOW. NOTE - NO-SHOW - BOOKINGS NOT CANCELLED 24 HOURS PRIOR TO FLIGHT DEPARTURE OR IF PASSENGER FAILS TO CHECK-IN ON TIME CHANGES. THIS RULE APPLIES THE PENALTY SUM FOR EACH MODIFIED FARE COMPONENT. I. NO SHOW FEE APPLIES IF THE PASSENGER IS NO SHOW ON ANY FLIGHT SEGMENT IN ADDITION TO THE PENAL- TY CHARGE. NO-SHOW DEFINITION - A PASSENGER FAILS TO CHANGE HIS OR HER RESERVATIONS BEFORE DEPARTURE OF THE FLIGHT. -------------------------------------------------- TICKETS ARE VALID FOR TRANSPORTATION ONLY IN STRICT SEQUENCE OF FLIGHT COUPONS. INCONSEQUENTLY USED FLIGHT COUPONS MAKE AIR TICKET INVALID FOR FURTHER TRANSPORTATION OR CHANGES/REFUND. *** GENERAL RULE FOLLOWS *** FOR VKZOW TYPE FARES
NOTE - IF ANY OF THE COUPONS IS NOT USED IN THE SEQUENCE SHOWN ON THE TICKET CHANGES OF UNUSED SEGMENTS IS NOT PERMITTED. ----- PASSENGER NAME CORRECT CHARGE UP TO THREE LETTERS KZT 5000 OR PASSENGER NAME CHANGE CHARGE MORE THAN THREE LETTERS KZT 10000.

FROM/TO KAZAKHSTAN
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY KC FLIGHT OPERATED BY KC.

FROM/TO KAZAKHSTAN
ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-14 - CHARGE 50 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH50. NOTE - PROOF OF AGE/AS EVIDENCE BY A PASSPORT ETC/MUST BE PRESENTED AT THE TIME OF TICKETING COPY OF THE APPROPRIATE DOCUMENT/PROOF OF AGE/MUST BE AFFIXED TO THE AUDIT COUPON WHEN ANY DISCOUNT APPLIES OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 6-14 - CHARGE 50 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS UM50. NOTE - PROOF OF AGE/AS EVIDENCE BY A PASSPORT ETC/MUST BE PRESENTED AT THE TIME OF TICKETING COPY OF THE APPROPRIATE DOCUMENT/PROOF OF AGE/MUST BE AFFIXED TO THE AUDIT COUPON WHEN ANY DISCOUNT APPLIES -------- UNACCOMPANIED CHILD UNDER 6 - NOT PERMITTED. OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - NO CHARGE TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS IN00. NOTE - PROOF OF AGE/AS EVIDENCE BY A PASSPORT ETC/MUST BE PRESENTED AT THE TIME OF TICKETING COPY OF THE APPROPRIATE DOCUMENT/PROOF OF AGE/MUST BE AFFIXED TO THE AUDIT COUPON WHEN ANY DISCOUNT APPLIES OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITH A SEAT - CHARGE 50 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS IN50. NOTE - PROOF OF AGE/AS EVIDENCE BY A PASSPORT ETC/MUST BE PRESENTED AT THE TIME OF TICKETING COPY OF THE APPROPRIATE DOCUMENT/PROOF OF AGE/MUST BE AFFIXED TO THE AUDIT COUPON WHEN ANY DISCOUNT APPLIES ---- UNACCOMPANIED INFANT - NOT PERMITTED.
2 FREE TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT - 1 IN EACH DIRECTION FARE BREAK SURFACE SECTORS NOT PERMITTED AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT.

FROM/TO KAZAKHSTAN
THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED - NONENDO/NONRER - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.
